skills.name: I Want to Help
skills.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to 50% of Clara's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Svarog Watches Over You
skills.desc:
Deals Physical DMG equal to 60% of Clara's ATK to all enemies, and additionally deals Physical DMG equal to 60% of Clara's ATK to enemies marked by Svarog with a Mark of Counter.
All Marks of Counter will be removed after this Skill is used.

skills.name: Promise, Not Command
skills.desc:
After Clara uses Ultimate, DMG dealt to her is reduced by an extra 15%, and she has a greatly increased chance of being attacked by enemies for 2 turn(s).
In addition, Svarog's Counter is enhanced. When an ally is attacked, Svarog immediately launches a Counter, and its DMG multiplier against the enemy increased by 96%.
Enemies adjacent to it take 50% of the DMG dealt to the target enemy. Enhanced Counter can take effect 2 time(s).

skills.name: Because We're Family
skills.desc:
Under the protection of Svarog, DMG taken by Clara is reduced by 10%.
Svarog will mark enemies who attack Clara with Mark of Counter and retaliate with a Counter, dealing Physical DMG equal to 80% of Clara's ATK.

traces.name: Kinship
traces.desc: When attacked, this character has a 35% fixed chance to remove a debuff placed on them.

traces.name: Under Protection
traces.desc: The chance to resist Crowd Control Debuffs increases by 35%.

dynamic.playstyle: To optimize Clara's performance in combat, focus on channeling all ATK or Energy buffs towards her. This will enhance her Counter-Attack damage and expedite the charging of her Ultimate ability. It is crucial to have either a dedicated healer or a shielder in the party to ensure Clara's survival, as well as that of the entire team.
lightcones: On the Fall of an Aeon

skills.name: Frigid Cold Arrow
skills.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to 50% of March 7th's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: The Power of Cuteness
skills.desc:
Provides a single ally with a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 38% of March 7th's DEF plus 190 for 3 turn(s).
If the ally's HP is 30% of their Max HP or higher, greatly increases the chance of enemies attacking that ally.

skills.name: Glacial Cascade
skills.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to 90% of March 7th's ATK to all enemies. Hit enemies have a 50% base chance to be Frozen for 1 turn(s). While Frozen, the enemy cannot take action and will receive Additional Ice DMG equal to 30% of March 7th's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

skills.name: Girl Power
skills.desc:
After a shielded ally is attacked by an enemy, March 7th immediately Counters, dealing Ice DMG equal to 50% of her ATK.
This effect can be triggered 2 time(s) each turn.

traces.name: Purify
traces.desc: Skill removes 1 debuff from an ally.

traces.name: Reinforce
traces.desc: The duration of the Shield generated from Skill is extended for 1 turn(s).

traces.name: Ice Spell
traces.desc: Increases Ultimate's base chance to Freeze enemies by 15%.

dynamic.playstyle: March 7th is a shielder who can be used with any team. Her shield increases the chance of a party member being targeted, making it ideal for tankier characters or even March herself.
lightcones: Day One of My New Life
